faq_search_text: In DM: Just type a track name or artist â€” the bot will find results. Pick one â€” it'll be downloaded and sent. Command /search: /search Imagine Dragons Links: â€¢ Yandex Music â€” paste a link like https://music.yandex.ru/album/.../track/... â€” bot downloads that exact track at 320 kbps â€¢ Spotify â€” paste a track link â€” bot finds and downloads it Sources (searched in order): 1. Local DB (TEQUILA / FULLMOON channels) 2. Yandex Music â€” up to 320 kbps 3. Spotify 4. SoundCloud 5. VK Music 6. YouTube â€” last resort Limits: â€¢ Max duration â€” 10 minutes â€¢ Max file size â€” 45 MB â€¢ If too large, bitrate is automatically reduced
faq_group_text: Add the bot to a group chat for everyone to search music. Triggers: â€¢ /search Drake â€¢ play Imagine Dragons â€¢ @TSmymusicbot_bot query How it works: â€¢ Bot auto-downloads the first match â€¢ Cleans up messages after sending â€¢ Ignores random messages without triggers
faq_inline_text: Type @TSmymusicbot_bot query in any chat â€” results appear in the input field. Previously downloaded tracks are sent instantly from cache.
faq_recognize_text: Send the bot: â€¢ Voice message â€” record the playing track â€¢ Audio file â€” send a snippet â€¢ Video â€” send a video with sound Bot identifies it via Shazam and offers to download. Requirements: â€¢ At least 5 seconds â€¢ Max 20 MB â€¢ Cleaner audio = better recognition

faq_recommend_text: Button "Your taste" in main menu. Bot analyzes your listening history and picks music for you. Improve recommendations: â€¢ Listen more â€” profile updates every 10 plays â€¢ Complete onboarding (genre â†’ vibe â†’ favorite artists) â€¢ Rate tracks â¤ï¸ / ğŸ‘
